=Documentation=

==Arduino Libraries==

  * *SoftPWM Library* - Up to 16 PWM channels on arbitrary pins.
    * [SoftPWMLibraryDocumentation]
  * *Tone Library* - Generate tones on arbitrary pins.
    * ToneLibraryDocumentation

  * *Rogue Robotics SD Card Module Library*
    * [http://www.roguerobotics.com/wikidocs/code/library/arduino/roguesd RogueSD Library Documentation]
  * *Rogue Robotics MP3 Playback Module Library*
    * [http://www.roguerobotics.com/wikidocs/code/library/arduino/roguemp3 RogueMP3 Library Documentation]

Both the SD Card Module and MP3 Playback Module libraries require adding a *[http://www.roguerobotics.com/wikidocs/code/arduino_serial_base_class Serial Base Class (click here for more info)]* to the Arduino core.  Hopefully we'll see the new [http://code.google.com/p/arduino/issues/detail?id=60 Serial Base Class in 0019 or 1.0] of the Arduino core.

*[http://code.google.com/p/rogue-code/downloads/list All available downloads]*
